A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This broke my heart and has irrevocably soured something I have enjoyed and treasured since childhood.  It wasn't even just a horrible Star Wars movie\, it was a horrible movie period.

Plot holes big enough to fly an Imperial Star Destroyer through\, inconsistent narrative\, characters reduced to caricatures\, forced humor\, uneven pacing\, unbelievable dialog\, too many loose ends\, and a complete butchery of the canon and lore of the Star Wars universe... I have not enough words to express the sadness and contempt I have for this travesty.

It has tainted the Star Wars franchise\, story\, and saga so badly\, I am unable to even enjoy the original movies\, the EU books\, the old collectibles\, multitudes of tabletop and video game... everything that brought me delight until now.

There was before seeing this movie\, and there is after seeing this movie.  After seeing this movie there is no going back\, and now Star Wars is dead to me. 40 years of love gone. #RIPStarWars
